SEARCH
Module com.example.cab302simplestock
Package com.example.cab302simplestock.model.ManagerInterfaces

Interface IItemManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
ItemManager
public interface IItemManager
Interface for a item manager defining CRUD methods for Items and some extra specific methods for searching and finding.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    addItem(Item item, String typeName, String categoryName, int groupID)
    Adds a new item to the database for a specific group, takes the name of the items type and category for easier implementation of adding the correct type and category for the item.
    void
    deleteItem(Item item)
    CRUD method to delete an item in the database Which value that's used to find the item is implementation specific.
    Item
    findItemByID(int itemId)
    Searches and finds an item in the database based on the items ID value.
    List<Item>
    getAllItems()
    Gets all items that exist in the database.
    List<Item>
    searchItemsByNameInGroup(String itemName, int groupID)
    Searches for every item in a category that includes the name or part of the name in the parameter.
    void
    updateItem(Item item)
    CRUD method to update an item in the database Which item that should be updated can be decided for any of the values, decided by the implementation.

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      int addItem(Item item, String typeName, String categoryName, int groupID)
      Adds a new item to the database for a specific group, takes the name of the items type and category for easier implementation of adding the correct type and category for the item. If the type or category doesn't exist this method should create them.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to add to the database.
      typeName - The name of the type the item is of.
      categoryName - The name of the category the item should be added to.
      groupID - The ID of the group the item should be added to.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly added item.

    • updateItem

      void updateItem(Item item)
      CRUD method to update an item in the database Which item that should be updated can be decided for any of the values, decided by the implementation.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to update.

    • deleteItem

      void deleteItem(Item item)
      CRUD method to delete an item in the database Which value that's used to find the item is implementation specific.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to delete, only needs the values that are used to find which item to delete.

    • getAllItems

      List<Item> getAllItems()
      Gets all items that exist in the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all items.

    • findItemByID

      Item findItemByID(int itemId)
      Searches and finds an item in the database based on the items ID value.
      Parameters:
      itemId - The ID of the item to search for.
      Returns:
      The item if found.

    • searchItemsByNameInGroup

      List<Item> searchItemsByNameInGroup(String itemName, int groupID)
      Searches for every item in a category that includes the name or part of the name in the parameter.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name or part of name for the items to search for.
      groupID - The ID of the group the item should be searched in.
      Returns:
      A list of all items with identical or part of the inputted name.
